name: Green Hallmark
slogan: Consume renewable energy in a simple fun and truly green way

team.name: Rayan Goutay
team.bioHtml: Regulatory and Strategy consultant. Legal insights around tokenization of financial instruments in blockchain protocols. Crowdfunding.

jobs.title: Marketing Expert
jobs.description:
Green Hallmark is pioneering an incredibly impactful new model to empower every user of energy to consume renewable energy and offset their carbon emissions in a simple, fun and truly green way.

We are now looking for a hands-on growth marketer to own our supporter acquisition funnel

We’ve done some initial experiments with Medium, but have yet to scratch the surface of what could be done and the community that can be grown.

Your initial focus will be on testing different channels and learning what works best - touching everything including paid and organic, digital and offline, quick wins and longshots.


You’ll define our long-term growth strategy.

How do we establish a growth strategy to make this happen? You’ll define how we can drive this forward by developing our growth strategy from the ground up.

You’ll have experience of growth marketing for fast-growing consumer start-ups. We are looking for someone who is hands-on in trying new ideas out, as comfortable working with data as building landing pages, albeit with no-code solutions.

You’ll report directly to the founders.


You should apply if:

What we’re doing here at Green Hallmark excites you!
You have a strong track record of multi-channel campaign management and optimisation, including performance marketing across multiple platforms
You think in hypotheses and tests
The only thing you love more than a bold idea is getting it working in real life
You are hungry to accelerate growth – ambitious, driven and proactive

we're open to hearing from a broad range of experiences
